items.question: What Sets Comprehensive Apart From TPL Insurance?
items.answer: Comprehensive Insurance offers extensive protection, covering theft, physical damage to your vehicle, passenger injury, and third-party liability. This means it covers accidents where you're at fault, including injuries to others and damage to their property.

items.question: What Is The Period Of Insurance Coverage?
items.answer: The insurance coverage period is one year (365 days) from the date of policy issuance.

items.question: Why Should I Buy A Boat & Yacht Insurance Policy?
items.answer: To stay protected while enjoying the water. Our third-party coverage ensures you're financially safeguarded against any liability for damages to others, giving you peace of mind every time you set sail.

items.question: Is There Any Number To Call If I Have Any Claim Questions?
items.answer: For any claim questions and clarifications, please call us any time at +974 70801616 to discuss your concern.
